sourcesContent: import{createPublicClient as r,http as t}from"viem";import{getJsonRpcEndpointFromChain as a}from"../../../utils/eth/getPublicClient.mjs";import"../../../errors.mjs";import"ofetch";const e=({chains:e,appId:i,address:o,rpcConfig:s})=>Promise.all(e.map((async e=>{let c=r({chain:e,transport:t(a(e,s,i))});return{balance:await c.getBalance({address:o}).catch((()=>0n)),chain:e}})));export{e as getBalanceForChains};
